title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tid2png
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Tid2png
description: Allow export single tiddler as image
readme: > Allow export single tiddler as image > 允许导出单个 tiddler 为图片 !! optional plugins dependencies * neotw-swal2: preview exported png * neotw-back-to-top(nprogress): progress bar for export png !! Tip * if yout want to reduce image size, you can remove the cover provided by Notion page plugins, because these images will be converted into binary, and each image will take up a large size * 如果想要减小图片大小, 可以移除 Notion page 插件 提供的cover, 因为这些图片会被转换成二进制, 每张图片都会占用很大的尺寸
